title: What Size Of Pigs Should I Start My Farm With?

tasks.task: Discussing initial pig farm size options and considerations
subtasks: Introducing the topic of choosing initial pig size for a farm
Comparing costs of different pig sizes (pregnant sow, growers, winners)
Analyzing risks associated with each pig size
Explaining the risk of transporting pregnant sows and potential loss of piglets
Considering experience needed for managing pregnant sows and new farmers' suitability
Discussing the advantages and disadvantages of starting with winsor pigs or grower pigs
Emphasizing the importance of experience and risk mitigation in farm decisions
Encouraging subscription and notification setup for new channel content
